mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eorder WHERE order_no IN (SELECT order_no FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, order_no FROM (SELECT order_no FROM eorder ORDER BY order_no DESC)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}) ORDER BY order_no DESC

SELECT * FROM eorder e LEFT OUTER JOIN eorder_list el ON e.order_no = el.order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN lp l ON el.lpno = l.lpno LEFT OUTER JOIN lpinfo i ON l.infono = i.infono WHERE e.order_no IN (SELECT order_no FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, order_no FROM (SELECT order_no FROM eorder ORDER BY order_no DESC)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}) ORDER BY e.order_no DESC

SELECT * FROM eorder e LEFT OUTER JOIN eorder_list el ON e.order_no = el.order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN lp l ON el.lpno = l.lpno LEFT OUTER JOIN lpinfo i ON l.infono = i.infono
WHERE e.${searchCon} = '${searchKey}' WHERE el.${searchCon} = '${searchKey}' WHERE i.${searchCon} LIKE '%${searchKey}%'

SELECT SUM(NVL(l.price,0)) total FROM eorder e LEFT OUTER JOIN eorder_list el ON e.order_no = el.order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN lp l ON el.lpno = l.lpno LEFT OUTER JOIN lpinfo i ON l.infono = i.infono WHERE i.GENRE = #{genre} AND SUBSTR(el.ORDER_DATE,1,10) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE-#{date},1,10)
